name: Make or Break: The Routine
description:
Made in Unity for #1GAM (January 2016)

You are a college student in the last week of submitting your thesis.
Balance your state of mind by performing different daily tasks for the remaining days in order to achieve the best grade possible.

Controls:
WSAD / Arrow keys: move
Spacebar: interact

Authors:
Pedro Lucas (@ordepsacul)
Pedro Pereira (@pmhpereira)

Assets by Kenney (@KenneyNL)
